page.title: 10NEW IBSTOCK SURGERY _ 2
page.content: The new Ibstock surgery,{Ibstock {House,}is open at the following times _ {Monday to Friday 8.30am - 6.00pm { Wednesday 8.30am - 10.30am { (emergencies only) It serves patients from Ibstock and surrounding villages. A local health visitor is based at the surgery. The doctors take night calls and any emergencies are sent to one of the three Leicester hospitals on a rota basis. Ibstock people are no more or less healthy than people in other parts of Britain. However, many chest problems are directly related to the local mining industry. When the Domesday researchers visited the surgery they were impressed by the welcome and efficient attention given to them.
